Installing Red

The list below shows the installation guides available based on the operating system being used.

If you want to host Red on a VPS and are unsure what operating system you should choose, we recommend Ubuntu 24.04 LTS.

  • Installing Red on Windows
  • Installing Red on macOS
  • Installing Red on Alma Linux 8.6-8.x
  • Installing Red on Alma Linux 9
